name: Foodroid
description:
Play as a food delivery robot in a Cyberpunk future. Deliver as much food as you can and try to set a high score. Grab the heaviest foods for most points. Use power-ups to easily get across the streets.

Maybe you're even good enough to get on the online leaderboard?

Can be played using keyboard, Xbox controller or Playstation 4/5 controller (we  recommend using a controller for the best experience!)

Runs great on Steam Deck for food delivery on the go!
